name: Air Takedown 3D Flight Simulator
description:
Get behind the controls of this Modern Fighter Jet - the F-18 in full 3D flight sim style. It is armed with super high tech weapons with auto-targeting. We have given you unlimited ammo so feel free to blast away your opponents. You will find yourself in the middle of the air battle from the moment you start.

"Awesome combat, its like I am really there!"
"One of the Best and Easiest combat flight sims I have ever seen"
"Super fun controls, amazing sound effects"

Those are some of the comments we have had from users who have played this game. Get behind the controls of this high tech modern combat fighter jet. You will find yourself at the forefront of the most heated air battles possible. We loaded the game full of enemy aircraft for you to take down. Shoot down as many aircraft as possible before you get shot down. There's no room for error; one wrong turn and you will be shredded.
Features:
--Realistic combat 3D flight simulator
--Easy touch controls
--Auto Targeting with unlimited missiles
--Exciting gameplay
--Highly addictive - you will want to play again and again
--Excellent sound effects and music
--Realistic missiles and explosions

There are 2 different styles of Gameplay: Either full on airplane dogfighting, or pure survival. In Head to Head, you will find yourself up against very skilled enemy planes. These guys are not going to just sit there and let you shoot them down. If you go after then, they will try and evade your fire. In Total Takedown mode, you must evade the gunfire from the ground as well as the enemy aircraft.

This 3D flight simulator is fun for all ages. If you every wanted to control a high tech fighter jet, here is your chance. Download it now and start targeting the enemy airplanes.
